Quick content note, we had some last minutes shuffling and today we’ll be hearing about the 2022 financials during our initiative update rather than an update on the Paxos proposal  Also note we’ll be trying breakout sessions this week  shy people welcome as always, we’re hoping this will be a time where you can engage and build or sit back and learn.
